Metadata.Title: Battle axe massacre [remake]
Metadata.Description: Hello there! This contract was made back in Hitman 2016 by a different user, i forgot the name, this is why it has the tag "[remake]"; the original description red something like: "It looks impossible, that's why you're here.". I think it didn't have perfect shooter, but i added it to make things more complicated, do not get spotted is also included to make things feel like H2016.steamcommunity.com/id/arygomessage me on steam if you want a remake it without certain complicationsCheers !
